biography: Dylan Boersma was born on January 13, 1995 (Capricorn) in Los Angeles County, California, USA as Dylan Michael Boersma. He is an actor, known for Drillbit Taylor (2008), The Story of Us (1999) and Father of the Bride Part II (1995). He is the Identical Twin Brother of Casey Boersma.
name: Dylan Boersma
